plugins.name: Easy Z
plugins.description:
NO LONGER NEEDED

Figma now supports this behaviour natively. Read "Canvas stacking" in this help article.


---


Reverse Z-Index in auto-layout frames


BUGS!

Just threw this together in an afternoon so expect bugs, which may not be fixed for some time.


HOW TO:

Just select a frame which has auto-layout applied, and run the plugin. It should keep everything in the correct order and position, just reversing the z-indexes.


TIP:

If you want to use this on components, you should create a frame inside your component that wraps all the content and apply Easy Z to that rather than the component itself.
plugins.tagline: Reverses the sacking order

plugins.name: Text Styles to Variables
plugins.description:
This is still an early version of the plugin. Feel free to share your ideas, feedback, and bug reports. Currently, Figma does not support percentage values like "line-height: 130%"; the plugin converts all such values into plain numbers.


Core Features


  • Local Text Style Conversion: Automatically consolidates and converts all local text styles into Figma Variables.
  • The plugin detects and binds existing variables from any collection to the appropriate text styles.


Key Benefits


  • Efficiency: Streamline your design process by automating the conversion of local text styles to variables.
  • Flexibility: Adds new text styles directly to the main variable collection.
  • No need to manually collect and add all text styles into new variables.
plugins.tagline: Transform local text styles to Figma variables: Seamless, Dynamic, and Efficient.

plugins.name: Color Cosmic
plugins.description:
Intuitive Gradient Enhancement Tool

This Figma plugin provides an intuitive way to enhance your designs with stunning gradients instantly.


Key Features

Instant Beautiful Gradients

With a single click, you can apply any gradient from a carefully curated library, transforming the aesthetic appeal of your work.

Preview and Adjustment Feature

The plugin also provides a unique feature of previewing and adjusting the direction of the gradient. Whether you want to set a specific angle for linear gradients or reorient them to suit your design's perspective, it's as simple as selecting an option.


Why Use This Plugin?

Efficient Workflow

Seamlessly integrated into Figma, this plugin streamlines your workflow by eliminating the need for manual gradient adjustments.

Seamless Integration with Figma

This plugin is seamlessly integrated into Figma.

Suitable for All Designers

This plugin is an essential tool for both experienced designers and beginners alike.



🇯🇵Translate in Japanese↓↓↓


直感的なグラデーション強化ツール

このFigmaプラグインは、あなたのデザインを一瞬で美しく変えることができます。選りすぐりのライブラリから任意のグラデーションを適用することができます。


主な特徴

一瞬で美しいグラデーション

一つのクリックで、あなたのデザインに美しいグラデーションを追加します。

プレビューと調整機能

グラデーションの方向をプレビューし、調整することができます。リニアグラデーションの特定の角度を設定したり、デザインの視点に合わせて再配置することが可能です。


なぜこのプラグインを使うべきか？

効率的なワークフロー

手動でのグラデーション調整の必要性を排除し、あなたのワークフローを合理化します。

Figmaとのシームレスな統合

このプラグインはFigmaにシームレスに統合されています。

全てのデザイナーに適しています

経験豊富なデザイナーから初心者まで、このプラグインはあなたのデザインを一段と引き立てます。

plugins.name: Logo Grid Resizer
plugins.description:
Logo Grid Resizer

Proportionally-resize a grid of logos. Scale each logo in a grid to achieve visual balance.


When you're designing and multiple logos are presented together - whether in a portfolio, customer list on a website etc - chances are the logos will be unbalanced. Horizontal, Vertical and Square logos exist and sizing them equally can be a pain.


If all logos have the same height: the horizontal logos are going to be much larger than vertical logos.

If all logos have the same width: the horizontal logos are now going to be tiny compared to the vertical logos.


Logo Grid Resizer will take the width-to-height ratio of each logo and scale them according to a scale factor so that they're proportionally balanced mathematically.


Sliders for base width and scale factor let you control the output.


Simply select the individual objects and run the plugin.


You won't need this plugin often, but when you do need it it's a life-saver.
plugins.tagline: Proportionally-resize a grid of logos. Scale each logo in a grid to achieve visual balance.

plugins.name: WaterMark Me
plugins.description:
Watermark Me is a powerful Figma plugin designed to help users seamlessly add watermarks to their designs. Whether you prefer text-based watermarks for drafts or images for a branded touch, Watermark Me streamlines the watermarking process. The plugin intelligently places customisable watermarks within frames, ensuring a professional and consistent look across your Figma projects.


Support my work and future plugins


Key Features:

  1. Text and Image Watermarks: Choose between text-based watermarks for dynamic information or upload images for a branded or decorative touch.
  2. Customisation Options: Tailor your watermarks with customisable text, opacity, colour, and image settings.
  3. Flexible Placement: Watermark Me intelligently places watermarks within frames, adapting to different sizes and orientations for a polished appearance.
  4. Real-time Preview: Enjoy a real-time preview of your watermarks before finalising, ensuring they complement your design seamlessly.


How to Use:

  1. Select frames or sections.
  2. Launch Watermark Me.
  3. Choose watermark type, Text or Image.
  4. Set your watermark text, adjust settings, and preview.
  5. Apply watermarks effortlessly, saving time and enhancing design professionalism.
plugins.tagline: Watermarking made easy

plugins.name: Effect.app — Real-time Image & Video Effects
plugins.description:
Add real-time, stackable effects to any frame without leaving Figma.


Effect.app for Figma embeds our browser-based effect engine directly in the plugin panel, so every edit stays on the canvas.


One-click workflow: Select a frame → open the plugin → tweak → Export.

A new, fully styled frame appears underneath the source.


Local & secure — All effects run in your browser; nothing ever leaves Figma.


Infinite combos — Chain effects in any order and adjust parameters (strength, radius, tone curves, etc.) in real time.


Available Effects

RGB Shift, CRT screen, Led screen, Halftone screen, Vignette, Stripes, Noise (Grain).

Blurs: Circular blur, Gaussian blur, Motion blur, Radial blur, Sharpen, Zoom blur

Color: Color balance, Color matrix, Color temperature, Exposure, Hue/Saturation, Levels, Map to Gradient, Monochrome, Dither, RGB Gain, Contrast

Distort: Cubify, Glitch, Perspective, Pinch, Polar to rectangular, Rectangular to polar, Ripple, Transform, Swirl


Coming soon – Presets

Save your effect stack, drop the URL in a comment, and anyone on the team can recreate the exact look in one click—perfect for brand systems.


How to use

  1. Select a frame.
  2. Run Effect.app from Plugins → Design Tools.
  3. Tweak effect order & settings in the side panel.
  4. Export—a rendered copy is added to the canvas.


Built by a tiny team obsessed with real-time graphics and a friction-free design flow.
plugins.tagline: Real-time visual effects for images — glitch, blur, halftone, stripes, CRT and more

plugins.name: Text Style Replace
plugins.description:
Text Styles Replace" is a Figma plugin engineered to simplify the process of creating text style guides. This plugin automates the replacement of text elements with their exact style properties, making it effortless for designers to generate accurate and comprehensive style documentation.


How to Use


  1. Select Text Layers: Choose the text elements you want to replace with style properties.
  2. Choose Properties: Use the plugin's intuitive interface to select the style properties you want to include, such as font size, weight, line height, and now even text color.
  3. (optional) Add Linebreaks: Toggle this option if you want each style property to appear on a new line.
  4. Replace: Click "Replace" to automatically update the selected text elements with the chosen style properties.
  5. Review: Once the text has been replaced, review the changes to ensure accuracy.


Core Features


  • Automated Replacement: Instantly replace text elements with selected style properties.
  • Customizable: Choose from a variety of style properties to include.
  • Optional Linebreaks: Add linebreaks between each style property for easier readability.


Key Benefits


  • Efficiency: Save time by automating the tedious task of manually documenting text styles.
  • Accuracy: Ensure that your style guides are precise and error-free.
  • Focus: Free up mental space to concentrate on the more creative aspects of your design work.
  • Collaboration: Makes it easier for team members to understand and implement text styles, streamlining the handoff process.
  • Versatility: Whether you're creating internal documentation or client-facing style guides, this plugin has you covered.
plugins.tagline: Convert text to its own style properties in Figma. Easy, single-click replacement with full control!

plugins.name: Mupixa
plugins.description:
🦸 Super powers for designers


Transform your designs into dynamic, engaging experiences with just a few clicks. Share your creations effortlessly through a simple link, opening up a world of possibilities for collaboration, research and insights gathering.


✨ Interactive Prototypes

Convert your designs into fully functional prototypes that look and feel like native apps, perfect for usability testing and stakeholder presentations.


✨ Dynamic Presentations

Share captivating slideshows that track viewer engagement, allowing you to identify which slides resonate most with your audience.


✨ Augmented Reality (AR) Experiences

Create immersive AR interactions that bring your designs into the real world, offering a cutting-edge way to showcase your work directly on client devices.


✨ Comprehensive Research

Conduct in-depth usability tests, launch market research surveys, and gather valuable feedback directly through your prototypes.


🚀 Analytics for Designs

💎 Heatmaps (hover, click/tap, rage etc.)

💎 Interaction flows

💎 Session replays

💎 Emotion recognition

💎 Integrated dynamic surveys

💎 A/B Testing

💎 Branded QR Codes

💎 and much more ...


Demo Prototype:

https://app.mupixa.com/demo/prototype

Demo AR (use Android:Chrome / iPhone:WebXR Viewer):

https://app.mupixa.com/ardemo

Demo Analytics:

https://app.mupixa.com/demo/analyse


🧐 Don’t You Have an Account Yet? 

❗A Mupixa.com account is required to use the plugin.❗

No worries! Register now for Free!

https://app.mupixa.com/signup


🤔 How Does It Work

1. Open your Figma project;

2. Open the Mupixa plugin (the first time the plugin is used it will redirect you to mupixa.com to login using your Mupixa credentials);

3. Publish your project;

4. Open the newly created project and define test scenarios;

5. Generate links or QR codes to share your prototype;

6. Evaluate collected analytics;


ℹ️ The plugin will upload all assets from the project and the following interactions if available:

Supported triggers:

- On Click;

- Mouse Down;

Supported actions:

- Back;

- Navigate To;


ℹ️ Each publish will create a new Mupixa project.
plugins.tagline: Analytics Platform for Designs

Bring your designs to life with real video game data: cover images, artwork, and metadata. Powered by the Internet Games Database (IGDB).


Use the following layer names for compatibility with this plugin:

  • "Poster"
  • "Title"
  • "Year"
  • "Genre"


No layer names, no problem. Tap the list icon to navigate to the details page, then apply the details data directly to your selection.
45443.tagline: Design with real video game data!

plugins.name: Pixelated Censor
plugins.description:
How to Use

  1. Draw a shape (Rectangle, Ellipse, Polygon, Star, Pen, or Pencil) over the area you want to censor.
  2. Select the shape, adjust the Pixel Size, and click Apply.
  3. Optionally, select the group it creates, adjust the Pixel Size and click Update.


Use Cases

  1. Hiding sensitive information.
  2. Redacting text or images.
  3. Compliance & NDA Production.
  4. NSFW or NSFL content.


Pricing

  1. Enjoy 5 free uses with full access to all features.
  2. Unlock unlimited access with free future updates for a one-time purchase.


Tips

  1. Feel free to rotate the shape however you want before applying the effect.
  2. When drawing custom shape with Pen or Pencil, the plugin will recognize the open loop and close it for you before applying the effect.
  3. After applying the effect, the pixelated_censor_group group is created. The group contains pixelated_censor_shape (your original shape) and pixelated_censor (the effect). You can edit the pixel size as long as the group still contains pixelated_censor_shape.
  4. [Figma's Issue] In some rare cases, exporting a frame with pixelated censor group(s) but no images or only JPG images may result in blurriness instead of a pixelated effect. To fix this, add a visible image to the frame and export it again.
plugins.tagline: Censor the area with pixelated blur effect

plugins.name: Localization plugin by Localazy
plugins.description:
What's Localazy?

Localazy is a continuous localization platform and web-based translation management system (TMS) that strives to make the usually awful software localization and translation experience efficient and enjoyable for individuals and product teams of any size.


Why Figma and Localazy?

So you can start localizing your designs in Figma right away! 


Localazy Figma Plugin allows you to upload all the text content from your Figma files to Localazy, translate the content into as many languages as you want, and then download translated content back to Figma to create localized designs quickly.


All the texts uploaded to Localazy are also immediately ready to be transferred into your mobile/web projects or other types of client UIs for a streamlined multilingual development experience.


Common issues with designs

Here’s a list of problems that might surprise you unprepared during the design process.

  1. Bi-directionality (LTR/RTL) of languages
  2. Distribution of word lengths in various languages
  3. Copying strings from design to code (time-consuming duplications)
  4. Continuous design localization problem & keeping track of updates
  5. and more…


Figma Plugin by Localazy helps to resolve these problems with ease.


How do I start?

  1. In your Figma project, go to the Plugins section and select Localazy
  2. Connect your existing project in Localazy (if you don't already have an account, the plugin will let you sign up and create one first)
  3. Go back to Figma and upload your texts


⚠️ NOTE: To use the Localazy Figma Plugin, create a Localazy account. Every new account comes with a 14-day trial period allowing you to test the integration before you subscribe to the Autopilot Plan subscription or higher.


📚 Resources

Here's a list of resources to help you get started.


Documentation

  1. Introduction
  2. Features & workflows
  3. Connect Plugin with Localazy
  4. UI overview
  5. Settings overview
  6. Uploading content to Localazy
  7. Downloading translations to Figma
  8. Finding Nodes
  9. Screenshots


Figma in Product Localization Series

  1. Preview designs in other languages
  2. Connect designs and translations via screenshots
  3. Make Figma the Source of Truth
  4. Make Figma and codebase independent Sources of Truth


Further Reading

  1. Agile localization for UX: The Localazy Figma plugin changes the game
  2. Multilingual Figma prototyping with Localazy done quickly
  3. How and why we built our Figma localization plugin
plugins.tagline: Tackle design localization with Localazy

plugins.name: FigPug Social Frame Generator
plugins.description:
Easily resize your frames for various social media apps in seconds.


-> This plugin includes presets for the following social media:

• Twitter

• Instagram

• Facebook

• LinkedIn

• Open graph / meta tag

• Custom size


-> To use this plugin

1. Install and run the “FigPug Social Frame Generator” plugin

2. Select your frame

3. Confirm the frame

4. Select the social media websites you’d like to generate for

5. Click the “generate” button

6. Export your images!


-> License

Upon install, you can access a selected number of social media presets. To access all of the social media presets, you will be asked to purchase a licence. Your license will allow you to generate an unlimited amount of profiles.


To purchase a license, please visit https://figpug.com


If you’ve discovered a bug or have any feature requests, please don’t hesitate to reach out: hello@figpug.com

plugins.name: LIBRO
plugins.description:
Work with components, text, colors and effect styles. Including multi rename tool.


LIBRO — плагин для работы с компонентами, стилями текста, цвета и эффектов с инструментом группового изменения имени и описания.


Возможности:


Компонент

  • Дублирование и удаление.
  • Редактирование имени, описания и ссылки на документацию.
  • Превью и переход к компоненту в главном окне.
  • Список вариантов для компонент сетов.


Текстовый стиль

  • Дублирование и удаление.
  • Редактирование имени и описания.
  • Превью и просмотр свойств.


Цветовой стиль

  • Дублирование и удаление.
  • Редактирование имени и описания.
  • Редактирование, добавление и удаление свойств.
  • Превью для стиля с однородной заливкой.


Стиль эффекта

  • Дублирование и удаление.
  • Редактирование имени и описания.
  • Изменение видимости и удаление свойств.
  • Превью стиля.


А ещё:


Древовидная навигация по компонентам и стилям с учётом вложенности по страницам, группам и фреймам с возможностью поиска по имени и описанию.


При множественном выборе компонентов и стилей доступно дублирование и удаление выбранных элементов. Групповое переименование с подстановочной маской. Поиск и замена в имени и описании с использованием регулярных выражений.

plugins.name: Balloon Annotations
plugins.description:
A simple little annotation plugin as my first contribution to the Figma communiy. I developed it primarily for myself and my team. But feel free to use it if you like it.


Instructions for use:

1. [optional] Select a frame, component, section, etc.

2. Choose the annotation type

3. Write your annotation

4. Make a few settings

  • Outline selection
  • Show usernames
  • Show date

5. Post your annotation


Under the "Read" tab, all annotations on the current page of the document are listed.


A few notes:

  • Annotations can be edited later in the respective frame. Text changes are also applied under the "Read" tab after a refresh of the list. 
  • The "Read" list can be refreshed by clicking on "Write" and then on "Read" again.
  • If the number is subsequently changed, only the number from the annotation is taken into account in the "Read" list, not the number from the marker. 
  • The automatic incrementing of numbers only takes integers into account. (no a, b, c etc.)
  • If an annotation is deleted, it is no longer shown in the "Read" list after a refresh.
  • Missing numbers in the sequence are automatically replaced with the next annotation ( integers only)


Please be patient with me, I'm a designer for a living and a developer for fun.
plugins.tagline: Write simple annotations on your designs to better collaborate with your team

plugins.name: Split Object
plugins.description:
English version is below.



🔌 どんなプラグイン？


Split Objectは、水平方向と垂直方向のパーティション数、水平方向と垂直方向の隙間を指定することで、オブジェクトを簡単に分割できるプラグインです。


このプラグインを利用することで、Webデザイナーやグラフィックデザイナーは、オブジェクトを素早く分割することができ、作業効率が大幅に向上します！



🔧 使い方


Split Objectは、分割したいオブジェクトをアップロードし、水平方向と垂直方向のパーティション数、水平方向と垂直方向の隙間を設定して、作成ボタンを押すだけで、オブジェクトを分割することができます。



⏱️ こんなときにおすすめ


簡単な操作性とすばやい処理速度により、オブジェクト分割作業を効率的に行うことができます。


ぜひ、このプラグインを利用して作業効率を向上させ、クリエイティブな作品を作り上げてください。


Split Objectは、デスクワークブランド「NERY」が提供するプラグイン#100シリーズ第一弾の作品になります！



📝 プラグイン機能のご要望・ご意見をお聞かせください


https://forms.gle/uikQFTa4TeX94nBp9



💼 NERYとは？


NERYは、FigmaとChromeのプラグインを開発・提供するデスクワークブランドです。



🚀 プラグイン#100シリーズとは？


プラグイン#100シリーズは、FigmaとGoogle Chromeのユーザー向けに、100個のプラグインをリリースするプロジェクトです。


このプロジェクトでは、クリエイターのニーズに応じたプラグインを開発し、デザイン作業をより便利かつ効率的に行えるようにサポートします。


プロジェクトは、企画から開発まですべてを行うのではなく、途中段階のものを皆様にお見せし、フィードバックをいただくことで、プラグインの機能拡充や新たな製品開発につなげます。


皆様の声がプラグインの開発に反映されることで、より使いやすく、より魅力的なFigmaとChromeを実現するために、皆様のご支援をお願いいたします。



🏢 開発会社


株式会社アジケ

https://ajike.co.jp/



===


🔌 What kind of plugin is it?


Split Object is a plugin that allows you to easily split objects by specifying the number of partitions in the horizontal and vertical directions and the spacing between them.


By using this plugin, web designers and graphic designers can quickly split objects, significantly improving their work efficiency!



🔧 How to use


Simply upload the object you want to split, set the number of partitions in the horizontal and vertical directions and the spacing between them, and press the create button to split the object.



⏱️ Recommended for times like these


With its simple operation and quick processing speed, you can efficiently perform object splitting tasks.


Please use this plugin to improve your work efficiency and create creative works.


Split Object is the first work of the "Plugin #100 Series" provided by the desk work brand "NERY"!



📝 Please give us your plugin feature requests and feedback


https://forms.gle/uikQFTa4TeX94nBp9



💼 What is NERY?


NERY is a deskwork brand that develops and provides plugins for Figma and Chrome.



🚀 What is the Plugin #100 Series?


The Plugin #100 Series is a project to release 100 plugins for Figma and Google Chrome users.


In this project, we will develop plugins that meet the needs of creators and support them to make design work more convenient and efficient.


We will not perform all the planning and development of the project, but by showing you the intermediate stages and receiving feedback, we will continue to improve the functionality of the plugins and develop new products.


Your feedback will be reflected in the development of the plugin, so we ask for your support to realize a more user-friendly and attractive Figma and Chrome.



🏢 Developer


Ajike Co., Ltd.

https://ajike.co.jp/

accepted.description:
NERY is a project to release 100 plugins for Figma and Google Chrome users.
Please follow me.

plugins.name: Text Line Height Fix
plugins.description:
Text Line Height Fix 是一款调整文字行高的插件。它能够让设计图中不同字号的行高，和开发环境下对应字号所占字符框高度相匹配（Android字符框：textview、iOS字符框：UI Label）。解决设计图与开发环境在文字高度不一致的情况下，导致还原度差的问题。帮助开发人员实现更精准的设计稿还原。

使用：

-选中文字图层，点击设计图对应的设备按钮，即可完成行高的修复。

-行高设为字号的倍数：可通过+-号按钮调整的倍率，也可以手动输入倍率。点击「go」按钮完成行高的调整。

注意：

-目前插件针对Android设计图，支持 5px-120px 的字号的行高修复，iOS可修复字号不限。

-仅限中文常用UI字体（苹方、思源）

感谢：

-Sketch 插件「Auto Fix iOS Text Line Height」作者 @Gis1on @Youngxkk。

-插件中使用的波纹效果来自 https://github.com/GeekLiB/Material-Design-JS-Button

plugins.name: Border Mockup
plugins.description:
✏️ Please, drop your suggestions in the comments! It'll help make the plugin even better and more useful.


Description


In certain situations, layouts blend into white backgrounds, making them difficult to distinguish. Adding a border helps improve the readability of frames in layouts.


This Figma plugin allows you to easily add borders to top-level frames, including frames inside sections but excluding their child elements. You can customize the border thickness, corner radius, corner smoothing, and border color.



Instructions


1. Install and Launch the Plugin:

- Install the plugin in Figma via the Figma Community.

- Launch the plugin through the "Plugins" menu in Figma.


2. Configure Settings:

- Thickness: Enter a value for the border thickness. The minimum value is 0.

- Corner Radius: Enter a value for the corner radius of the frame. The minimum value is 0.

- Corner Smoothing (%): Enter a value for corner smoothing in percentage (from 0 to 100).

- Border Color: Choose a color for the border.


3. Preview Changes:

- Changes to the settings are automatically applied for preview on top-level frames.


4. Apply Changes:

- Click the "Apply" button to apply the border settings to all top-level frames and close the plugin.

- A notification will appear, confirming that the border has been successfully applied.


5. Cancel Changes:

- If you close the plugin without clicking the "Apply" button, the changes will not be saved, and all frames will revert to their original state.


By following these steps, you can easily and quickly customize stylish borders for your top-level frames in Figma.


Made by Sergei Goltsov
plugins.tagline: Add borders to your top-level frames effortlessly with customizable options.

plugins.name: Figma StyleBook for WordPress

This plugin allows you to make one click Stylebook for your frames. This will detect all colors, text and fonts and create Headings, color presets and fonts.


If your font can be found on Google Font, plugin will create also link to download them. It will try to find variable font first and if it's not available, then regular is selected.

plugins.name: Copy&Paste
plugins.description:
This Figma plugin is designed to make it easy for designers to duplicate frames and make quick modifications to them. It enables you to select a frame and specify the number of duplicates you want to create, and the plugin will automatically copy and paste the frame for you. This can save you a significant amount of time and effort, especially if you need to create multiple copies of the same frame with slight variations.

With this plugin, you can easily create multiple versions of the same frame without having to manually copy and paste each one. Simply select the frame you want to duplicate, enter the number of copies you need, and the plugin will take care of the rest. This can be especially useful for creating UI elements such as buttons, icons, or other components that require multiple variations.

In short, this Figma plugin is a time-saving tool for designers who need to create multiple copies of frames quickly and easily.

accepted.name: Helfa Aymane
accepted.description: 🎨 Passionate Product Designer | Figma Aficionado | Crafting Creative Framer Templates | Turning Ideas into Visual Wonders | Let's Design the Future Together

plugins.name: Multiple Text Editor
plugins.description:
⭐ Edit multiple texts in a single click;

  1. Paste to Replace on selected items in the Canvas;

⭐ Assign functions to typed content to generate random names and numbers with flexibility;

  1. Similar to the "Rename" tool, but applied to texts;

⭐ Apply items from a list to multiple texts on the canvas at once;

  1. Each line from the list is applied to a different text element;
  2. Utilize an AI to generate lists and streamline your workflow!



How to use:

Text Tools:

Select the texts you want to edit, type the content to be replaced in the text field, and click apply.


To generate random names or numbers, click the "+" icon in the "Names" or "Numbers" item; it will add a reference in the text field that will be translated into random names or numbers. You can construct a sentence and add the reference.



List to Text:

Select the texts you want to edit, type a list of anything in the text field, and click apply. Each line of the list will be applied to different text elements in the Canvas.


You can use an AI to generate lists, streamlining your process!

plugins.name: Text Style Switcher
plugins.description:
The Text Style Switcher simplifies the often tedious task of adapting typography for different screens. When you need to transition between desktop and mobile text styles, manually updating each text layer can be a real hassle, especially in larger projects with numerous text elements.


Consider a project with 50+ screens that require adapting from desktop to mobile text styles. Without the plugin, you're burdened with updating each layer individually – a slow and tiresome process. Text Style Switcher comes to the rescue, enabling you to switch styles with a single click and giving you more time for creative pursuits. It's the secret weapon you need for crafting sleek, responsive designs across all screen sizes.


How to Use:

  1. Create text styles for desktop and mobile in Figma.
  2. Add device-specific prefixes in square brackets (e.g., [Desktop] or [Mobile]) to style names to identify the target device for each style.
  3. Select the text layer or frame you want to switch styles for.
  4. Open Text Style Switcher, click the button for the style you want to switch to.
  5. Voilà! Your text style is updated to match the target device.

accepted.name: Mike
accepted.description: Just trying to build good things

plugins.tagline: One-Click Switching Between Desktop and Mobile Type Scales

plugins.name: Fontexter
plugins.description:
Fontexter is a Figma plugin that converts selected text layers to display the font names used in your design.


When you run the plugin, it will update each text layer's value to the font name and style. This can save time when working with large and complex designs. Fontexter also supports nested text layers within frames or groups.


Created in collaboration with ChatGPT (who also wrote the description and chose the name), Fontexter is a useful addition to your design workflow that can improve productivity.
plugins.tagline: Convert text layers to font names instantly

plugins.name: Smart Data
plugins.description:
Smart data inserts data from a JSON file or random data according to the layer name.

How to insert data from JSON:
1. Prepare a JSON file
2. Drop the file into the plugin window
3. Rename layers on a canvas according to the JSON file
4. Select a frame
5. Paste data

To place an image on the canvas you need to insert to the JSON file URL to the image. Images insert only in rectangle and ellipse types of nodes.

How to insert a random data
1. Rename your text layers. For example, to insert the random email address you need to rename your text layer "email"
2. Select a frame
3. Run plugin

Smart Data supports next random fields:
name
email
weekday
phone
movie
address
time
email
date
food
number
price
emoji

Document with example https://www.figma.com/file/Y9WzkjOzCw4dpNjNLODixY/Smart-Data-example?node-id=0%3A1

plugins.name: Countdown Timer
plugins.description:
Select your Text, and turn it into a Countdown Timer that everyone can see.


How to use

  1. Select a Text or ShapeWithText (FigJam) on the canvas
  2. Set the time - 90 or 1:30 for 90s. 1:00:00 for 1h
  3. Start the timer
  4. Remove the timer from the list when you are done


I use this for a lunch break and toilet break while sharing the Figma screen. People also use it for Pomodoro (25-minute work session). Do what you want with it.


Warning: Closing the plugin will stop all timers.
plugins.tagline: Select your Text, and turn it into a Countdown Timer

plugins.name: Summarize AI - Free Unlimited Use
plugins.description:
Save time on lengthy feedback and complex documents — instantly Summarize them to help you make quick, informed decisions. You can also use Rewrite feature to give you 5 suggestions and Fix Spelling to polish your text. Try it out for FREE!


How to Use

  1. Select a Text
  2. Choose to Summarize, Rewrite or Fix Grammar
  3. Click one of the results to replace your Text (or copy to the clipboard if no text selected)


Features

  1. ✨ Summarize (3 results) - Great for summarizing feedbacks or documentations.
  2. ✏️ Rewrite (5 results) - Best for improving text for website and app designs.
  3. 🔨 Fix Spelling (1 best result) - Corrects grammar mistakes.
  4. 👈 Auto Replace - Turn on to instantly replace the selected text with the first result.
  5. 🌐 Output Language (20 languages) - Select language you want the output to be.


Tips

  1. This plugin works well on any Text, FigJam's StickyNote and FigJam's ShapeWithText.
  2. If your text length is too long, try split into multiple text elements.


Free Version

  1. Unlimited access to all features.
  2. Text length is limited to 200 characters per request to keep server costs low.


Paid Version

A monthly plan or 50% OFF annual plan.

  1. Unlimited access to all features and future updates.
  2. Text length increases to 4,000 characters per request.


Cancelation

Subscriptions are handled by Figma. You can cancel subscription by:

  1. Click your profile avatar in the top-left corner of Figma
  2. Click Settings
  3. Click Community and find the section Community purchases.
  4. Click the three dots ••• next to Summarize AI
  5. Click Manage subscription
  6. In the newly opened Stripe portal, select Cancel Plan


About Data


1. Data We Do Not Store

We do not retain or store any textual content submitted by users. All text data is processed through our fine-tuning model and transmitted to Claude AI (operated by Anthropic) for processing. By using our service, you acknowledge and consent that your submitted content is subject to Anthropic's Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.


2. Data We Store

We maintain minimal user data limited to: Figma user IDs (numeric format) solely for the purpose of payment verification and subscription management.


3. Data Processing

Your submitted content is processed on a transient basis solely for the purpose of AI model fine-tuning and generation. Data transmission to Anthropic's Claude AI is conducted in accordance with applicable data protection regulations.


4. Data Retention

Figma's user IDs are retained only for the duration of the usage by applicable law. All other data is processed in real-time and is not permanently stored on our servers.


5. Data Security

We implement industry-standard security measures to protect stored Figma user IDs.


6. Updates to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy as needed. Users can view the changes in Figma's community plugin description (this page).


Credit: Preview mobile screens by DI_Designing

plugins.name: Variables Count Find Trace
plugins.description:
Purpose


This plugin provides powerful tools to search through local variable collections and trace the references of variables associated with selected objects. This enables you to efficiently identify and work with variables, ensuring consistency and accuracy in your files and design systems.


Plugin built with NO external network access. Safe for organizations and enterprise usage.


Using the Plugin - Find Mode


1. Search for Variables:

  1. Enter a variable name or value in the search field (case-insensitive).
  2. Press Enter or click the search button to execute the search.


2. Search Process:

  1. The plugin searches for the entered term through all variable collections in the local file and in connected libraries.
  2. If objects are selected on the Figma canvas, the search will include variables bound to those selected objects.
  3. The plugin searches not only for direct matches but also for any variables that reference other variables containing the search term.


3. View Results:

  1. Matches are counted, and the associated top-level group names or selected objects are displayed.
  2. Variable paths, references, and values are shown in the results.
  3. If no matches are found, the plugin will display a "Matches: 0" status.


Using the Plugin - Trace Mode


1. Select an Object:

  1. Select an object on your Figma canvas or a layer from within the layers panel.


2. Trace Bound Variables:

  1. The plugin displays any variables bound to the selected object.
  2. Variables are shown with their associated style properties, and any references to other variables are listed beneath the main variable.
  3. Color variables are displayed with a visual swatch.


3. Search reference variables:

  1. Tap the search button after each reference variable to search for it in variable collections of the local file or in connected libraries.


Open the playground for use case examples.
